mapper.select: select M.m_Nickname, M.m_Picture,cc.cc_Cont,cc.cc_Indent,cc.cc_Date,cc.bc_No,cc.cc_No,cc.cc_Step,cc.cc_Group from member M ,content_comment cc where m.m_email=cc.m_email and bc_no=#{bc_No} order by cc_group desc ,cc.cc_step

select M.m_nickname, M.m_Picture ,BC.bc_Cont, bc.bc_Date, bc.bc_No ,bc.bc_filecount ,M.m_Email,BC.b_no,bc.bc_Goods from Member M ,blog_content BC where m.m_email=bc.m_email AND bc.b_no=#{b_No} order by bc.bc_no desc
select count(m_Email) from blog_content_good where bc_No = #{bc_No}
select * from blog_content_good where bc_No = #{bc_No} and m_Email = #{m_Email}
mapper.delete: delete from blog_content_good where bc_No = #{bc_No} and m_Email = #{m_Email}
mapper.select: select * from( select *from blog_content where b_No = #{b_No} and bc_goods > 0 and bc_Date >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-300,'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY bc_goods desc, bc_date desc) where rownum < 6
update blog_content set bc_goods = #{bc_Goods} where bc_No = #{bc_No}
select * from(select * from blog_content where b_No = #{b_No} and bc_Date >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-300,'YYYYMMDD') and bc_Type = 'y' ORDER BY bc_Date desc) where rownum <6
mapper.delete: delete from content_comment where cc_No=#{cc_No} or (cc_group=#{cc_Group} and cc_Indent > #{cc_Indent} and cc_step> #{cc_Step})
mapper.update: update content_comment set cc_cont=#{cc_Cont} where cc_no=#{cc_No}
update content_comment set cc_step=cc_step+1 where cc_group=#{cc_Group} and cc_step>#{cc_Step}
mapper.select: select u.bc_no,u.File_name,u.bc_cont,u.upload_date,m.m_nickname,m.m_picture,m.m_email,bc_filecount,rownum from (select f.bc_No,f.file_Name,f.upload_date,bc.m_email,bc.bc_cont,bc.bc_filecount from B_Content_File f, Blog_Content bc where f.bc_no = bc.bc_no and b_No = #{b_No}) u, member m where m.m_email = u.m_email order by upload_date desc

select u.file_name, u.upload_date, u.bc_no, u.m_email, u.b_no,u.bc_cont, u.bc_goods, m.m_nickname,u.bc_filecount,m.m_picture from (select * from(select bc.bc_filecount,f.file_name,f.upload_date,f.bc_no,bc.m_email,bc.b_no,bc.bc_cont,bc.bc_goods from b_content_file f, blog_content bc where f.bc_no = bc.bc_no and bc.bc_Date >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-300,'YYYYMMDD') and bc.b_no =#{b_No} order by bc.bc_goods desc) where rownum < 7) u, member m where u.m_email = m.m_email
